Title: À corps perdu
Writer: Marcel Beaulieu, Yves Navarre (novel), Léa Pool
Actors: Matthias Habich, Johanne-Marie Tremblay, Michel Voïta, Jean-François Pichette
Plot: A war photographer returns home to Montréal to discover that his two partners have left him to be together. Alone in the city, he photographs what he sees, trying to heal both his war memories and a broken heart.
